alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 11:17AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AREAS OF FREEZING DRIZZLE AND SLIPPERY CONDITIONS... Freezing drizzle developed over portions of central, north- central, and northeast Minnesota late this morning. Some locations impacted include International Falls, Brainerd, Grand Rapids, Hibbing, Virginia, Orr, Bigfork, Walker, Longville, Pine River. The freezing drizzle is forecast to spread eastward with time early this afternoon and may affect Aitkin, McGregor, Pine City, Hinckley, Moose Lake, and Cloquet by mid-afternoon. Road, bridges, and sidewalks in these areas will accumulate a thin coating of ice and become slippery. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
